text:
Zee Tamil is an Indian pay television Tamil language channel that is owned by Zee Entertainment Enterprises. The channel started broadcasting on 2008 and is available internationally.
Daily and Current Updates.
See also "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_programs_broadcast_by_Zee_Tamil_(India) Zee Tamil programs]"
Availability.
The channel available across India and other countries through satellite and cable. It also available through digital and mobile entertainment platform, ZEE5.
